CustomField.description: Maximum number of successive failures allowed for a tool before the execution is automatically failed. For example, if set to 2, the tool is allowed 1 failure and will fail on the 2nd failure. Prevents infinite retry loops when a tool keeps failing with the same error. Only applies when ErrorHandlingPolicy__c is 'Autonomous Recovery' and AgentType__c is NOT 'Conversational'. Conversational agents let the LLM decide how to handle errors.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Maximum successive failed attempts per tool before execution failure (Function/Workflow agents only). Conversational agents let the LLM handle retries.
CustomField.label: Maximum Tool Retries
